library(readxl)
population_d = read.csv("C:\\Users\\howar\\Downloads\\1.0 Dataset-20250423T024816Z-001\\1.0 Dataset\\population.csv")
View(population_d)

### Cleaning -- Population
library(dplyr)
population_d = population_d %>%
  mutate(age.group = recode(age.group,
                            "5-Sep" = "5-9",
                            "Oct-14" = "10-14"))

population_d <- population_d %>%
  filter(age.group != "overall")

library(xlsx)
write.csv(population_d,file = 'Population_d.csv')

### Plot
population_d$population = as.integer(population_d$population)
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(population_d,aes(x = year, y = population), ylim = )+
  geom_bar(stat = "identity")+
  facet_wrap(~age.group)

ggplot(population_d,aes(x = age.group, y = population), ylim = )+
  geom_bar(stat = "identity")
